website_summaries.verdict: Fun concept, but the quality just isn't sufficient for us to recommend this motion lamp.
pros: A Bluetooth speaker and a motion lamp in one unit is a great idea

product_meta.title: Sharper Image Motion Lamp with Bluetooth Speaker 17.5" Classic Retro Style (Green)
product_meta.description:
It's a throwback with a modern twist: the Lava Lamp Wireless Speaker meshes the 60s trend with wireless technology. Flip a switch to activate the lava lamp's hypnotic bubbles that collide and transform as they travel up and down the lamp. The base of the Lava Lamp Wireless Speaker is no traditional lamp bottom - the base is equipped with a Bluetooth speaker that connects to mobile phones, tablets, and more. Control music playback directly from the base of the lamp, or use your connected device to play or pause music, adjust volume, or skip songs. Lamp can be used independently from speaker. Technical specs: Lamp: 30W, AC 110V. Lamp Height 17.5".
